summary: This mod makes it so you can have an unlimited amount of Magelight's placed at one time and increases the duration to 5 minutes instead of 60 seconds.
descriptionHtml:
It had annoyed me that you can only place one Magelight at a time, even though we see other mages in game place multiple! This fixes that, there is now no limit to how many you can place and the duration has been extended to 5 minutes.

I may implement multiple different colors for the spell if there is interest and I can competently do it.
author: Devilschain
